aiDryPlan.title: DRYING PLAN
aiDryPlan.greeting: Hello! I am your AI body-drying assistant. I need your data to build a detailed analysis. Let's start!
aiDryPlan.profileAutoFill: Data automatically filled from your profile
aiDryPlan.confirmProfilePrompt: Is the data correct? Confirm or update it.
aiDryPlan.selectFieldPrompt: What would you like to change?
aiDryPlan.saveProfilePrompt: Would you like to save the new data to your profile?
aiDryPlan.saveProfileWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: this will update your profile data (gender, age, height, weight). Your current KBJU goals will remain unchanged.
aiDryPlan.saveProfileError: Failed to save data to profile. Try again later.
aiDryPlan.saveProfileSkipped: OK, profile data unchanged. Moving to results!
aiDryPlan.responseHint: Great question! I recommend following the plan for at least 2-3 weeks for visible results. Don't forget about regular workouts and drinking enough water (2-3 liters per day).
aiDryPlan.askTargetWeight: Desired target weight in kg? Or press "Skip". Weight must be within normal BMI range.
aiDryPlan.invalidAge: Please enter a valid age from 14 to 100.
aiDryPlan.invalidHeight: Please enter height from 100 to 250 cm.
aiDryPlan.invalidWeight: Please enter weight from 30 to 300 kg.
aiDryPlan.targetOutOfRange: Target weight is outside normal BMI. Allowed range
aiDryPlan.enterValidTarget: Enter a weight within normal range or skip.
aiDryPlan.analysisIntro: ‚úÖ Data received! Here is your personalized analysis:
aiDryPlan.analysisFooter: If you have additional questions ‚Äî just ask, I'll help!
aiDryPlan.applyQuestion: Would you like to apply changes based on the results?
aiDryPlan.applyWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: after applying, your current goal and KBJU norms will be changed.
aiDryPlan.applyError: Failed to apply changes. Please try again later.
aiDryPlan.underweight: Your weight is below normal. Weight gain is recommended.
aiDryPlan.overweight: Your weight is above normal. Weight reduction is recommended.
aiDryPlan.weightOk: Your weight is within normal range.
aiDryPlan.targetBelowNorm: Target weight is below minimum normal BMI
aiDryPlan.targetBelowWarn: Such weight may pose a health risk.
aiDryPlan.targetAboveNorm: Target weight is above maximum normal BMI
aiDryPlan.targetOk: Target weight is within normal range
aiDryPlan.riskPlateau: Plateau effect ‚Äî weight loss stalls at a certain stage. The body adapts to calorie deficit.
aiDryPlan.riskPlateauHigh: With your BMI (>25), plateau most often occurs at weeks 3‚Äì5 after starting the deficit.
aiDryPlan.riskPlateauLow: With low BMI (<20), plateau can hit as early as weeks 1‚Äì2 ‚Äî the body actively resists further weight loss.
aiDryPlan.riskAvitaminosis: Avitaminosis ‚Äî restricted diet may lead to deficiency of vitamins A, D, E, B-group.
aiDryPlan.riskAcetonemia: Acetonemic tendency ‚Äî strict carb restriction causes the body to intensively break down fats, raising blood ketone levels.
aiDryPlan.riskExhaustionF: Critically low calories (<1200 kcal) for a woman ‚Äî risk of exhaustion, muscle loss, hormonal imbalances.
aiDryPlan.riskExhaustionM: Critically low calories (<1500 kcal) for a man ‚Äî risk of exhaustion and muscle loss.
aiDryPlan.riskJoints: With low BMI (<20) during drying, there is increased risk of joint fragility due to lack of fats and minerals.
aiDryPlan.riskMicroDef: At <1600 kcal, there is increased risk of macro- and microelement deficiency (calcium, magnesium, iron, zinc).
aiDryPlan.riskProteinLow: Protein deficiency ‚Äî current calorie plan may provide less than the minimum norm (0.8 g/kg).
aiDryPlan.riskProteinHigh: Protein intolerance ‚Äî excessive protein intake (>2.5 g/kg) may strain kidneys and liver.
aiDryPlan.riskMenstrual: Menstrual cycle loss (amenorrhea) ‚Äî with excessive weight and body fat reduction.
aiDryPlan.riskMenstrualMin: Minimum safe weight to maintain cycle
aiDryPlan.recWater: Drink 2‚Äì3 liters of water per day.
aiDryPlan.recVegetables: Increase vegetables in your diet for fiber.
aiDryPlan.recVitamins: Add a multivitamin complex to compensate for deficiencies.
aiDryPlan.recProtein: Ensure adequate protein intake (1.8‚Äì2.2 g/kg during drying).
aiDryPlan.recSleep: Sleep at least 7‚Äì8 hours ‚Äî critical for recovery and hormonal balance.
aiDryPlan.recTracking: Keep a food diary and weigh yourself once a week in the morning on an empty stomach.
aiDryPlan.mealPlanIntro: üìã Here is your weekly meal plan based on your data:
aiDryPlan.kcalFloorWarning: Calculated calories were below the safe minimum ‚Äî plan raised to 1200 kcal
aiDryPlan.censorWarning: ‚õî Sorry, this topic is prohibited. I cannot discuss: drugs, alcohol, tobacco, pornography, sexual services, BDSM, weapons, violence, gambling, eating disorders (anorexia/bulimia), self-harm, discrimination, banned substances or dangerous medical advice. I only answer questions about healthy nutrition, supplements, nutrients and the drying plan.
aiDryPlan.menuCorrected: ‚úÖ Menu has been adjusted according to your preferences. Here is the updated plan:
aiDryPlan.menuCorrectedFooter: If you need more changes ‚Äî write what to replace.
aiDryPlan.correctionHint: To adjust the menu, write what you want to replace. For example: "I don't eat fish", "Replace dairy products", "I'm vegetarian".
aiDryPlan.qaSupplements:
üíä Recommended supplements during drying/weight loss:

‚Ä¢ Multivitamins ‚Äî to compensate for deficiencies with a restricted diet
‚Ä¢ Omega-3 (fish oil) ‚Äî 1000-2000 mg/day for joints, heart and brain
‚Ä¢ Vitamin D3 ‚Äî 2000-4000 IU/day, especially in winter
‚Ä¢ Magnesium ‚Äî 200-400 mg/day (citrate or glycinate) for muscles and sleep
‚Ä¢ Calcium ‚Äî 500-1000 mg/day if low dairy intake
‚Ä¢ Iron ‚Äî only if blood tests indicate deficiency

‚ö†Ô∏è Consult a doctor before taking supplements!
aiDryPlan.qaMacros:
ü•© Macro recommendations based on your plan:

‚Ä¢ Protein (P): 1.6-2.2 g/kg ‚Äî essential for preserving muscle during deficit. Sources: chicken, fish, eggs, cottage cheese, legumes.
‚Ä¢ Fats (F): 0.8-1.2 g/kg ‚Äî needed for hormones, vitamin absorption. Sources: olive oil, nuts, avocado, fatty fish.
‚Ä¢ Carbs (C): remaining calories. Choose complex: grains, vegetables, legumes. Avoid sugar and white flour.

üìå During drying, increase protein to 2.0-2.5 g/kg for maximum muscle preservation.
aiDryPlan.qaMicro:
üß¨ Key micronutrients:

‚Ä¢ Calcium (1000 mg) ‚Äî bones, teeth, muscles. Sources: dairy, sesame, broccoli
‚Ä¢ Magnesium (400 mg) ‚Äî muscles, nerves, sleep. Sources: nuts, buckwheat, spinach
‚Ä¢ Iron (8-18 mg) ‚Äî blood, energy. Sources: meat, liver, legumes
‚Ä¢ Zinc (8-11 mg) ‚Äî immunity, hormones. Sources: meat, pumpkin seeds
‚Ä¢ Potassium (3500 mg) ‚Äî heart, muscles. Sources: bananas, potatoes, avocado
‚Ä¢ Sodium ‚Äî limit to 2300 mg/day

‚ö†Ô∏è With calorie deficit, deficiency risk increases ‚Äî eat diverse foods.
aiDryPlan.qaWater:
üíß Water recommendations:

‚Ä¢ Base norm: 30-35 ml per 1 kg body weight per day
‚Ä¢ With training: +500 ml per hour of exercise
‚Ä¢ During drying/weight loss: increase by 20% to support metabolism
‚Ä¢ Distribution: 200-300 ml every hour, no more than 500 ml at once

üìå Dehydration signs: dark urine, dry mouth, headache, fatigue.
aiDryPlan.qaProteinSupp:
ü•õ Protein supplements:

‚Ä¢ Whey ‚Äî fast absorption, ideal post-workout. 25-30 g per serving.
‚Ä¢ Casein ‚Äî slow absorption, great before bed. 25-30 g.
‚Ä¢ Isolate ‚Äî for lactose intolerant. Minimal fats and carbs.

‚ö†Ô∏è Supplements don't replace real food! Get most protein from whole foods.
aiDryPlan.qaOmega:
üêü Omega-3 fatty acids:

‚Ä¢ Recommended dose: 1000-2000 mg EPA+DHA per day
‚Ä¢ Food sources: salmon, mackerel, sardines, walnuts, flaxseed
‚Ä¢ Benefits: heart, joint, brain health, reduced inflammation
‚Ä¢ During drying, especially important for joints and hormonal balance

üìå Take with fatty foods for better absorption.
aiDryPlan.qaCreatine:
üí™ Creatine monohydrate:

‚Ä¢ Dose: 3-5 g per day, every day
‚Ä¢ Helps preserve strength and muscle mass during calorie deficit
‚Ä¢ May retain 1-2 kg of water ‚Äî this is normal, not fat
‚Ä¢ Safe for long-term use

üìå Drink enough water when taking creatine.
aiDryPlan.qaMealTiming:
‚è∞ Meal frequency:

‚Ä¢ Optimal: 3-5 meals per day (3 main + 1-2 snacks)
‚Ä¢ Interval between meals: 3-4 hours
‚Ä¢ Distribute protein evenly (25-40 g per meal)
‚Ä¢ Last meal: 2-3 hours before bedtime

üìå What matters most is total daily calories and macros, not exact timing.
aiDryPlan.qaCalories:
üî• Calories and your plan:

Your calculated maintenance already accounts for activity level. A 15-20% deficit is optimal for healthy weight loss. A larger deficit (>25%) can lead to muscle loss, metabolic slowdown and binge eating.

üìå Check weight weekly. If no change after 2 weeks ‚Äî adjust by 100-200 kcal.
aiDryPlan.qaPlateau:
üìä How to overcome plateau:

1. Refeed day ‚Äî 1 day at maintenance calories (once every 1-2 weeks)
2. Increase physical activity (add cardio or increase intensity)
3. Change macro ratios (increase protein)
4. Check hidden calories (sauces, drinks, snacks)
5. Diet break ‚Äî 1-2 weeks at maintenance, then resume deficit

‚ö†Ô∏è Plateaus are normal. Don't cut calories below the safe minimum!
aiDryPlan.qaSleep:
üò¥ Sleep and recovery:

‚Ä¢ 7-9 hours of sleep is critical for weight loss and drying
‚Ä¢ Sleep deprivation raises cortisol (stress hormone), which retains water and slows fat burning
‚Ä¢ Growth hormone (important for muscles) is released primarily during sleep

üìå Tips: consistent bedtime, dark room, no screens 1 hour before bed, temperature 18-20¬∞C.
aiDryPlan.autoUpdateMessage: Time to update your drying plan! Based on your current data, I will generate an updated plan with progressive carb, fat, and sugar restriction.
aiDryPlan.weeklyUpdateDesc: The plan gets stricter: reduced carbs and fats, increased protein, eliminated high-sugar foods. Progressive diet cleaning for maximum results.

aiRecipes.title: AI RECIPES
aiRecipes.greeting: Hello! I will help you find recipes that match your meal plan. Write what you want to cook, or what ingredients you have.
aiRecipes.recipesFound: Here are some recipes that match your request and meal plan:
aiRecipes.searchPlaceholder: What do you want to cook?
aiRecipes.noRecipesFound: Enter the products you have and I will suggest a recipe.
aiRecipes.intentNoMatch: ü§î I understood your request, but unfortunately couldn't find matching recipes. Try listing specific products, for example: chicken, rice, broccoli.
aiRecipes.generatedRecipe: I created a recipe specifically for your products:
aiRecipes.censorWarning: ‚õî Sorry, this topic is prohibited. I cannot discuss: drugs, alcohol, tobacco, pornography, sexual services, BDSM, weapons, violence, gambling, eating disorders, self-harm, discrimination, banned substances or dangerous medical advice. I only answer questions about recipes and healthy nutrition.
aiRecipes.greetingReply:
Hello! üëã I'm your AI recipe assistant. Tell me what you want to cook, or list the ingredients you have. For example:
‚Ä¢ "Chicken, rice, broccoli"
‚Ä¢ "I want a light breakfast"
‚Ä¢ "High-protein meal for cutting"
aiRecipes.thanksReply: You're welcome! üòä If you want more recipes ‚Äî just write your ingredients or describe what you'd like to cook.
aiRecipes.aboutAI:
ü§ñ I'm an AI recipe assistant. Here's what I can do:

üîç Find recipes by ingredients ‚Äî tell me what's in your fridge
üçΩÔ∏è Pick a meal by request ‚Äî "light lunch", "protein dinner"
üéØ Match to your goal ‚Äî cutting, weight loss, muscle gain
üìä Analyze calories and macronutrients
üë®‚Äçüç≥ Create a unique recipe from your products

Just write your request!
aiRecipes.clarifyRequest:
ü§î I didn't quite understand that. Could you clarify? I can help with:
‚Ä¢ Finding recipes: list products like "chicken, rice"
‚Ä¢ Picking meals: "light breakfast", "protein dinner"
‚Ä¢ Goal-based recipes: "recipes for cutting", "for muscle gain"
aiRecipes.clarifySingleWord: ü§î "{{word}}" ‚Äî do you mean a product? If so, add a few more ingredients and I'll find a recipe. For example: "{{word}}, chicken, cheese".
aiRecipes.offTopicClarify:
üôè I specialize in recipes and nutrition. Could you rephrase your request? For example:
‚Ä¢ List products: "chicken, rice, broccoli"
‚Ä¢ Describe what you want: "hearty lunch"
‚Ä¢ Specify a goal: "recipes for cutting"
aiRecipes.notFoodClarify: ü§î I couldn't recognize food products in your message. Try listing specific ingredients separated by commas, for example: "eggs, tomato, cheese" or "I want a light breakfast".
aiRecipes.calorieQuestion: üìä Calorie count depends on portion size and cooking method. List products or a dish, and I'll show approximate calories in the recipe. For example, "chicken with rice" is about 350-400 kcal.
aiRecipes.proteinQuestion: üí™ Daily protein intake: 1.5-2g per kg of body weight when training, 0.8-1.2g for a regular lifestyle. Want high-protein recipes? Write "protein lunch" or "recipes for cutting".
aiRecipes.macroQuestion: üçé Macros are proteins, fats, and carbohydrates. Balanced ratio: 30% protein, 30% fat, 40% carbs. I show calories and protein for each recipe. Want me to pick balanced meals?
aiRecipes.benefitsQuestion: ü•¶ Each product has unique properties. Write a specific product or meal, and I'll pick recipes with detailed calorie and macronutrient analysis.
aiRecipes.substituteQuestion: üîÑ To find substitutes, list the products you have, and I'll pick a recipe just for them. You can also add restrictions: "dairy-free", "gluten-free".
aiRecipes.mealFrequencyQuestion: ‚è∞ Optimally 3-5 meals per day with 3-4 hour intervals. I can pick recipes for breakfast, lunch, dinner or snacks. Write, for example: "light snack" or "hearty lunch".
aiRecipes.analysisLowCal: üéØ Selected low-calorie recipes for your goal:
aiRecipes.analysisHighProt: üí™ Selected high-protein recipes for muscle gain:
aiRecipes.analysisGoodProt: Excellent source of protein for muscle recovery!
aiRecipes.analysisLightMeal: Light meal, ideal for calorie deficit.
aiRecipes.analysisHeavyMeal: Hearty meal, great for muscle gain.
aiRecipes.analysisSimple: Simple recipe with minimal ingredients ‚Äî quick and convenient!
aiRecipes.analysisTipLowProt: Recommendation: add more protein-rich foods (chicken, fish, eggs, cottage cheese) for better balance.
aiRecipes.analysisTipHighCal: Tip: if you're in a deficit, reduce the portion or replace some carbs with vegetables.

progressAnalysis.noRecommendations: Keep logging your meals to get recommendations
progressAnalysis.lowCalories: You are consuming fewer calories than needed. This may slow down your metabolism.
progressAnalysis.highCalories: Calorie intake exceeds daily goal. Try to control portion sizes.
progressAnalysis.goodCalories: Excellent! Calorie intake is within normal range.
progressAnalysis.lowProtein: Not enough protein. Add more meat, fish, or legumes.
progressAnalysis.goodProtein: Protein intake is at a good level!
progressAnalysis.lowWater: Drink more water! It's important for metabolism.
progressAnalysis.tipConsistency: Consistency is the key to success. Keep tracking your nutrition daily.
progressAnalysis.tip1: Weigh yourself every morning on an empty stomach for more accurate progress tracking.
progressAnalysis.tip2: Plan your meals ahead to avoid impulsive snacking.
progressAnalysis.tip3: Sleep 7-8 hours - it affects metabolism and appetite.
